#Riled by: saloni_7
num=int(raw_input())  #taking input for test cases

while num:
  str=raw_input().strip()   #taking string
  sum=0
  for character in range(0,len(str)) :
   sum=sum+ord(str[character])  #sum of ASCII value of characters in string
  sum=sum/len(str)
  print chr(sum)   #printing character
  num=num-1
